009package Ch07_MorphologicalFilters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryClosing;
019import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryDilation;
020import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryErosion;
021import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryMorphologyFilter;
022import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryOpening;
023import imagingbook.common.util.EnumUtils;
024
025/**
026 * This plugin implements a binary morphology filter using an arbitrary
027 * structuring element that can be interactively specified by the user.
028 * 
029 * @author WB
030 * @version 2022/01/24
031 */
032public class Bin_Morphology_Free implements PlugInFilter {
033        
034        private static enum OpType {
035                Dilate, Erode, Open, Close;
036        }
037
038        static final int W = 9; // width and height of the structuring element
039        static boolean[] freeStructure = new boolean[W * W];
040        static boolean showElement = false;
041        static OpType op = OpType.Dilate;
042
043        static { // initially set the center element
044                freeStructure[(W * W) / 2] = true;
045        }
046
047        @Override
048        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
049                return DOES_8G;
050        }
051
052        @Override
053        public void run(ImageProcessor orig) {
054                if (!showDialog()) {
055                        return;
056                }
057                
058                byte[][] H = makeStructureElement(freeStructure);
059                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) orig;
060                
061                BinaryMorphologyFilter filter = null;
062                switch(op) {
063                case Close:     
064                        filter = new BinaryClosing(H); break;
065                case Dilate:
066                        filter = new BinaryDilation(H); break;
067                case Erode:
068                        filter = new BinaryErosion(H); break;
069                case Open:
070                        filter = new BinaryOpening(H); break;
071                }
072                
073                filter.applyTo(bp);
074                
075                if (showElement) {
076                        ByteProcessor pH = IjUtils.toByteProcessor(H);
077                        pH.invertLut();
078                        pH.setMinAndMax(0, 1);
079                        ImagePlus iH = new ImagePlus("H", pH);
080                        iH.show();
081                        GuiTools.zoomExact(iH, 10);
082                }
083        }
084
085        private boolean showDialog() {
086                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
087                String[] labels = makeFilterLabels();
088
089                gd.addCheckboxGroup(W, W, labels, freeStructure);
090                String[] ops = EnumUtils.getEnumNames(OpType.class);
091                gd.addChoice("Operation", ops, op.name());
092                gd.addCheckbox("Show structuring element", showElement);
093                gd.showDialog();
094                if (gd.wasCanceled())
095                        return false;
096
097                for (int i = 0; i < W * W; i++) {
098                        freeStructure[i] = gd.getNextBoolean();
099                }
100                
101                showElement = gd.getNextBoolean();
102                op = OpType.valueOf(gd.getNextChoice());
103                return true;
104        }
105
106        private byte[][] makeStructureElement(boolean[] structure) {
107                byte[][] kernel = new byte[W][W];
108                int i = 0;
109                for (int v = 0; v < W; v++) {
110                        for (int u = 0; u < W; u++) {
111                                if (structure[i])
112                                        kernel[v][u] = 1;
113                                else
114                                        kernel[v][u] = 0;
115                                i++;
116                        }
117                }
118                return kernel;
119        }
120
121        private String[] makeFilterLabels() {
122                String[] labels = new String[W * W];
123                for (int i = 0; i < labels.length; i++) {
124                        labels[i] = " ";
125                }
126                labels[(W * W) / 2] = "x";
127                return labels;
128        }
129
130}
